remarks: The predicate "is a 3-dim lattice volume".  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2012.)
statement:
islvol3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islvol3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
islvol3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islvol3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islvol3.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
islvol3.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
islvol3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. V <-> E. y e. P E. p e. A ( -. p .<_ y /\ X = ( y .\/ p ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d B p y $.
$d K p y $.
$d P p y $.
$d X p y $.
